Package it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions

package it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw
     
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColumnOutOfBoundsException
    The ColumnOutOfBoundsException is an exception that is thrown when a column index is out of bounds.
    EmptySackException
    The EmptySackException is an exception that is thrown when trying to access an empty tile sack.
    IllegalColumnInsertionException
    The IllegalColumnInsertionException is an exception that is thrown when trying to insert a tile into an illegal column on a game board.
    InvalidCoordinatesForCurrentGameException
    The InvalidCoordinatesForCurrentGameException is an exception that is thrown when invalid coordinates are provided for the current game state.
    InvalidIndexException
    The InvalidIndexException is an exception that is thrown when an invalid index is encountered.
    InvalidIPAddress
    Custom exception class to handle invalid IP address errors.
    InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
    The InvalidNumberOfPlayersException is an exception that is thrown when an invalid number of players is encountered.
    InvalidPort
    Custom exception class to handle invalid IP Port errors.
    InvalidScoreException
    The InvalidScoreException is an exception that is thrown when an invalid score is encountered.
    MissingShelfException
    The MissingShelfException is an exception that is thrown when a required shelf is missing.
    NoTileException
    The NoTileException is an exception that is thrown when a tile is not found.
    NullPlayersException
    The NullPlayersException is an exception that is thrown when an players is null during the game.
    SingletonException
    Custom exception class to represent exceptions related to singleton classes.
    UsernameNotFoundException
    The UsernameNotFoundException is an exception that is thrown when a username is not found.
